name: best-of-nashville-09-voting-closes-tonight-at-5pm
title: Best Of Nashville ‘09 Voting Closes Tonight At 5PM
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded: Nashville-enthusiasts, now’s the time to make your voice heard in the Nashville Scene’s Best of Nashville 2009 Readers Choice poll. Voting closes at 5pm today, so get your ballots in before then, lest you have to wait another year for the chance to root for your favorite locals. And um, we wouldn’t mind if you paid a bit of special attention to category #141, if you can get that far.
